mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation_page_tb (team_id, main_category_id, page_category_id, create_date, end_date, goal_amount, story_title, story_content, main_img_url, donation_tag_id, donation_page_show) VALUES (#{teamId}, #{mainCategoryId}, #{pageCategoryId}, #{createDate}, #{endDate}, #{goalAmount}, #{storyTitle}, #{storyContent}, #{mainImgUrl}, #{donationTagId}, #{donationPageShow})

INSERT INTO donation_news_page_tb (donation_news_page_id, donation_page_id, page_category_id, news_content, user_id)
VALUES
(#{donationNewsPageId}, #{donationPageId}, #{pageCategoryId}, #{newsContent}, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT *
FROM donation_page_tb dpt LEFT OUTER JOIN donation_image_tb dit on dit.donation_page_id = dpt.donation_page_id where dpt.donation_page_id = #{donationPageId}

SELECT dp.donation_page_id, dp.team_id, dp.main_category_id, dp.story_title, dp.create_date, dp.end_date, dp.goal_amount, dp.story_title, dp.main_img_url, dp.donation_tag_id, mc.main_category_name, dt.donation_tag_name, t.team_name FROM donation_page_tb dp LEFT OUTER JOIN main_category_tb mc ON dp.main_category_id = mc.main_category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN donation_tag_tb dt ON dp.donation_tag_id = dt.donation_tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team_tb t ON dp.team_id = t.team_id;

SELECT dp.donation_page_id, dp.team_id, dp.main_category_id, dp.story_title, dp.create_date, dp.end_date, dp.goal_amount, dp.main_img_url, dp.donation_tag_id, mc.main_category_name, dt.donation_tag_name, t.team_name FROM donation_page_tb dp LEFT OUTER JOIN main_category_tb mc ON dp.main_category_id = mc.main_category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN donation_tag_tb dt ON dp.donation_tag_id = dt.donation_tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team_tb t ON dp.team_id = t.team_id WHERE story_title Like concat('%', #{storyTitle}, '%');
mapper.update: update donation_page_tb set donation_page_id = #{donationPageId}, team_id = #{teamId}, main_category_id=#{mainCategoryId}, page_category_id=#{pageCategoryId}, create_date=now(), end_date=#{endDate}, goal_amount=#{goalAmount}, story_title=#{storyTitle}, story_content=#{storyContent}, main_img_url=#{mainImgUrl}, donation_tag_id=#{donationTagId}, donation_page_show=#{donationPageShow} where donation_page_id = #{donationPageId}
mapper.select: SELECT donation_page_id, team_id, main_category_id, page_category_id, create_date, end_date, goal_amount, story_title, story_content, main_img_url, donation_tag_id, donation_page_show FROM donation_page_tb WHERE main_category_id = #{mainCategoryId}

SELECT dp.donation_page_id, dp.team_id, dp.main_category_id, dp.story_title, dp.create_date, dp.end_date, dp.goal_amount, dp.main_img_url, dp.donation_tag_id, mc.main_category_name, dt.donation_tag_name FROM donation_page_tb dp LEFT JOIN main_category_tb mc ON dp.main_category_id = mc.main_category_id LEFT JOIN donation_tag_tb dt ON dp.donation_tag_id = dt.donation_tag_id WHERE dp.end_date IS NULL OR dp.end_date >= CURDATE()

SELECT dp.donation_page_id, dp.team_id, dp.main_category_id, dp.story_title, dp.create_date, dp.end_date, dp.goal_amount, dp.main_img_url, dp.donation_tag_id, mc.main_category_name, dt.donation_tag_name FROM donation_page_tb dp LEFT JOIN main_category_tb mc ON dp.main_category_id = mc.main_category_id LEFT JOIN donation_tag_tb dt ON dp.donation_tag_id = dt.donation_tag_id WHERE dp.end_date < CURDATE()
